text.headline: SRM Team Humanoid Electonics Domain Head
text.text: Led electronics integration for bipedal robots (gait & image processing). Assisted with developing low-power image segmentation models.

text.headline: IIT Mumbai Indo US Robo-League
text.text: Led manipulator arm development for grasping competition. Achieved second place.

text.headline: BITS Pilani Techfest
text.text: Co-developed telepresence humanoid system for medical applications (user movement mimicry). Secured second place for best idea.

text.headline: SRM Konvolve
text.text: Designed navigational shoe with haptic feedback for visually impaired users. Won second place for innovation.

text.headline: RoboGames 2018
text.text: Led team victories in Humanoid Bipedal Obstacle Race and Xylophone playing robot categories.

text.headline: HappSales PVT LTD
text.text: Developed CRM product using natural language for CRUD operations. Improved data entry speed and simplified application for easier customer onboarding.

text.headline: Northeastern University Masters in Information Systems
text.text: Pursuing Master's degree, focusing on applying technology to solve real-world problems. Taking courses in Deep Learning methods and optimization techniques.
